# Cache for Roxy

[![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/roxy-cache.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/roxy-cache)
[![Docs.rs](https://docs.rs/roxy-cache/badge.svg)](https://docs.rs/roxy-cache)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

Cache implementations including in-memory LRU, Redis, compressed caching,
fallback chains, and RPC-specific caching with configurable TTL policies.
